Burglars specialize in breaking and entering to rob homes and businesses. These criminals focus on gaining access to secure buildings and bypassing traps and other security measures while remaining undetected all the while. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 19 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14 [Burglar](/NPCs.aspx?ID=890) **Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 210 **Perception** +10; (11 to find traps) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +7, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +12, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +7 **Str** +2 **Dex** +4 **Con** +1 **Int** +1 **Wis** +2 **Cha** +1 **Items** [Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Composite Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75) (10 arrows), [lesser darkvision elixir](/Equipment.aspx?ID=89), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), [Thieves' Tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) --- **AC** 21 (22 vs. traps) **Fort** +7 **Ref** +12 **Will** +10 +1 circumstance to all saves vs. traps **HP** 60 **Deny Advantage** The burglar isn't [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to creatures of 4th level or lower that are [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39), flanking, or using surprise attack.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** The burglar is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker it can see; **Effect** The burglar gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** shortsword +14 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d6+6 piercing **Melee** sap +12 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)), **Damage** 1d6+4 bludgeoning **Ranged** composite shortbow +14 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6+4 piercing **Mobility** When the burglar Strides half their Speed or less, that movement does not trigger reactions. **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** The burglar deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Surprise Attack** On the first round of combat, if the burglar rolls [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) for initiative, creatures that haven't acted are [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) to them.
